name: RightNow CUDA Editor
description: The first GPU-native AI code editor specifically designed for CUDA GPU programming, featuring real-time profiling, cycle-accurate emulation, and AI that understands CUDA for performance optimization and bottleneck identification.
community_quotes: 196 upvotes on Product Hunt launch showing strong developer interest
The first GPU-native code editor that CUDA engineers have always wanted

name: RightNow CLI
description: Claude Code for CUDA, an open-source AI CLI for GPU development that provides terminal-based AI assistance for CUDA programming, complementing the RightNow CUDA Editor with command-line capabilities.
community_quotes: Open-source solution for developers who prefer CLI workflows
Brings AI assistance to terminal-based GPU development

name: Google Antigravity IDE
description: Google's free AI-powered development platform featuring autonomous coding agents powered by Gemini 3 that can write, test, and debug applications while developers delegate complex tasks.
community_quotes: Google just released the IDE that could end coding as we know it and it's completely free
An 'agent-first' coding tool built for the next generation of AI-powered software development

name: ChatGPT Business Project Memory
description: OpenAI's ChatGPT Business update introducing project-only memory features and workspace discovery capabilities that help AI maintain context across coding sessions.
community_quotes: New project-only memory features for enhanced context retention
Custom connectors with search/fetch capabilities for company knowledge

name: Parasoft AI-Driven Autonomous Testing
description: AI-driven autonomous testing workflows specifically designed for CI/CD pipelines, representing the evolution from CI/CD to CI/AI with automated testing and deployment workflows.
community_quotes: AI-driven autonomous testing workflows for CI/CD pipelines
Represents the next phase of software delivery with CI/AI
